description:
Fix Image Caching System

Resolve issues with image caching to ensure proper storage, retrieval, and invalidation of cached images.

Requirements:
- Identify current caching failures (images not caching, stale cache, or excessive cache usage)
- Implement or fix cache-control headers for image requests
- Set appropriate cache expiration policies based on image types
- Handle cache invalidation when images are updated
- Optimize cache storage to prevent excessive disk/memory usage
- Test image loading behavior for first visit, subsequent visits, and after updates
- Ensure cached images display correctly across different browsers
- Handle edge cases: network failures, corrupted cache entries, and cache quota exceeded
title: Fix image caching and invalidation

- Set appropriate cache expiration policies based on image types

- Ensure cached images display correctly across different browsers
- Handle edge cases: network failures, corrupted cache entries, and cache quota exceeded
